reapack.name: TormyVanCool_ChapterMarker.lua
reapack.desc: Add/Edit 'CHAP=' markers for Audiobooks, adding a SideCar.TXT file

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_ChapterRegion.lua
reapack.desc: Add/Edit Regions with title: 'CHAP=Title:|Performer:|year:|Label:|Duration|' for each item containing music, for Podcasts/Redcorded Broadcasts, witha SideCar.TXT file

reapack.name: TormyVanCool_ChapterMarkerUpdater.lua
reapack.desc: Updates SideCar.TXT file, when markers are moved on the time line.
